Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at ASTRUS Moscow City Hotel in Moscow (Troparevo-Nikulino), you'll be close to Orlov Museum of Paleontology and Ochakovo Beer Museum. This spa hotel is within the vicinity of Bitsa Park and Natalya Sats Musical Theater.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 495 guestrooms featuring refrigerators. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and sofa beds.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, which include 2 indoor swimming pools, a health club, and an indoor tennis court. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 4 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, a computer station, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Planning an event in Moscow? This hotel has 13450 square feet (1250 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request).


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 4 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at ASTRUS Moscow City Hotel in Moscow (Troparevo-Nikulino), you'll be close to Orlov Museum of Paleontology and Ochakovo Beer Museum. This spa hotel is within the vicinity of Bitsa Park and Natalya Sats Musical Theater.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Orlov Museum of Paleontology - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
Ochakovo Beer Museum - 4.4 km / 2.8 mi
Bitsa Park - 5.2 km / 3.3 mi
Natalya Sats Musical Theater - 5.3 km / 3.3 mi
Moscow State University - 5.4 km / 3.4 mi
State Darwin Museum - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi
Sparrow Hills - 6.6 km / 4.1 mi
Kant Ski Slope - 7.4 km / 4.6 mi
Luzhniki Stadium - 7.5 km / 4.7 mi
Memorial Mosque - 7.6 km / 4.7 mi
Metro Museum - 8.2 km / 5.1 mi
Museum of the Great Patriotic War - 8.2 km / 5.1 mi
Poklonnaya Gora Memorial - 8.3 km / 5.2 mi
Victory Park - 8.3 km / 5.2 mi
Church of St. George - 8.4 km / 5.2 mi

The preferred airport for ASTRUS Moscow City Hotel is Moscow (VKO-Vnukovo Intl.) - 14.3 km / 8.9 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
EN CASO DE PAGO DIRECTO: TODOS LOS PAGOS REALIZADOS EN EL HOTEL SERAN EN LA MONEDA LOCAL DEL PAIS AL TIPO DE CAMBIO VIGENTE.

Cancelaciones hasta una hora despues de la confirmacion sin gastos. CANCELLATIONS MADE UP TO ONE HOUR AFTER CONFIRMATION, CAN BE MADE FREE OF CHARGE.
